items.label: OpenWeatherMap API Key
items.description: If this is included, the watchface will display the name of your current location. Get your API key at openweathermap.org.

items.label: Location Name
items.description: The name of the location to display on your watch. This is only used if you don't have an OpenWeatherMap API key.

items.label: Weather Update Interval (minutes)
items.description: How often the weather is updated. Lower values will drain the battery faster.

items.label: Step Goal
items.description: The number of steps you want to take each day. Step progress is displayed on the outer ring.

items.label: Move Goal
items.description: The number of minutes you want to be active each day. Move minute progress is displayed on the middle ring.

items.label: Active Calories Goal
items.description: The number of calories you want to burn while active each day. Active calorie progress is displayed on the inner ring.
